description: When that Kansas City sun is beatin’ a bit hot, you better worry not, because Polar Oasis offers quite a lot of positively pleasing frozen treats that are sure to hit the spot. They’ve got delightful Shaved Ice, Ice Cream, Floats, and more! And with quite a selection of Gluten Free, Sugar-Free, Natural (without dyes), Low-Fat, Non-Fat, Dairy Free, and Low-Calorie treats, all your dietary preferences are sweetly appeased. For all your favorite fun and flavors, take a stroll on over to this blissfully delicious Polar Oasis.
name: Polar Oasis
